title: Graffiti on base of Ṭalʻat Ḥarb monument
description: The statue is located in Mīdān Ṭalʻat Ḥarb. Photographer's description: Pictures taken during the Egyptian Revolution. Text in image: انتهى الدرس يا غبى ارحل يا عديم الدم, Mubarak out, Game over Mr. Mubarak, Get the fuck out of Egypt!!, Stupid Mubarakstupid, No to Mubarak. Translation of Text in image: End of lesson idiot, Leave you bloodless man.
name: Mubārak, Muḥammad Ḥusnī, 1928-
collection: University on the Square: Documenting Egypt's 21st Century Revolution
source: From: Graffiti on base of Ṭalʻat Ḥarb monument
